1.2.name: wordpress/the-bar-steward
1.2.description:
Some plugins like to embed themselves into the default WordPress admin bar. Some developers and their clients dislike this.

Plug-ins that do this are:

  • Yoast WordPress SEO
  • CDN Synch Tool
  • NextGen Gallery
  • BackWPup
  • Social Metrics
  • Ultimate Security Checker

Remove all or any of these from your admin bar with this plugin.

If you find this plug-in just so totally awesome that you develop a massive urge to donate, feel free to donate here: http://wordpressfoundation.org/donate/

All and any feedback - post it on the forum or email wordpress@pointandstare.com
